channel.title: Thoughts about API needs for DevTracker

item.title: Thoughts about API needs for DevTracker
item.dc:creator: JohnAdams
item.description:
@siemvaessen As we discussed earlier, Iâ€™ve added some thoughts on what DevTracker would need to have as an aggregate API to drive 1) country pages and 2) hierarchical projects. I can probably break these down further into appropriate JSON-type structures, but will give you an idea of some of the challenges.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1htg_53JI3uTGs4QXZqa0xPTGc/view?usp=sharing

Please add questions/comments/ideas to the document, it should be editable.
